add(address[],uint256[]).details: Only callable by Governance, delegates token votes to msg.sender until they are claimed

params.amounts: The array of amounts of tokens to add to each users vesting schedule
params.users: The array of users to be added to the vesting contract

claim().details: Reentrancy guard to prevent double claims

returns.amount: The amount of tokens available to claim

params._timelockDelay: Seconds to delay the timelock from starting
params._timelockLength: The length of the timelock in seconds
params._token: The address of the Oh! Finance Token

setRegistry(address).details: Requires sender to be Governance of the new Registry to avoid bricking.Ideally should not be used

Add(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a user is added to the timelock

Claim(address,uint256).notice: Emitted every time a user claims tokens

add(address[],uint256[]).notice: Add a set of users to the vesting contract with a set amount

balances(address).notice: The total vested balance of tokens a user can claim

claim().notice: Claim all available tokens for the msg.sender, if any

claimable(address).notice: Available tokens available for a user to claim

claimed(address).notice: The total amount of tokens a user has already claimed

setRegistry(address).notice: Set the Registry for the contract. Only callable by Governance.

timelockLength().notice: The length in seconds of the timelock

timelockStart().notice: The UNIX timestamp that the timelock starts at

userdoc.notice: Contract to manage linear token vesting over a given time periodUsers accrue vested tokens as soon as the timelock starts, every second
